home.title: Which drink suits you?
home.desc:
Find your perfect drink with 10 fun questions!
Trendy MZ-style personality test

question.q: What is your group hangout style?
Which drink do you crave when drinking alone?
Your role at a drinking party?
Music you want to hear while drinking?
How are you the next day after drinking?

soju.title: üç∂ Soju
soju.summary: Honest and easygoing, soju is perfect for you!
soju.desc:
On days you want to open up,
you love sharing real stories with friends over soju.
Simple but deep friendships, made deeper with soju.
soju.tip: Enjoy soju with delicious snacks, but drink moderately!

somaek.title: üç∫ Somaek
somaek.summary: The life of the party, somaek is your drink!
somaek.desc:
Like the perfect mix of beer and soju,
you bring energy wherever you go!
At gatherings, work dinners, or parties, somaek makes everyone happy.
somaek.tip: Best with chicken or pizza! Enjoy responsibly :)

makgeolli.title: üç∂ Makgeolli
makgeolli.summary: Full of emotion and tradition, makgeolli suits you!
makgeolli.desc:
You enjoy the soft grain aroma and traditional style.
Under cherry blossoms in spring or listening to rain,
you know how to savor a special moment with makgeolli.
makgeolli.tip: Pair with Korean pancakes for the best combo! Recharge your vibes~

wine.title: üç∑ Wine
wine.summary: Atmospheric and deep, wine is your match.
wine.desc:
You love deep talks and emotions.
A glass of wine melts away the day's fatigue.
Perfect for alone time or special occasions!
wine.tip: Enjoy a glass of wine with good music for perfect healing.

whisky.title: ü•É Whisky
whisky.summary: Sophisticated taste, whisky is for you!
whisky.desc:
Like a glass of whisky, you have deep and rich charm.
You enjoy savoring the aroma and taste of whisky alone or on special occasions.
whisky.tip: Pour a glass of whisky and enjoy your own time.

highball.title: ü•Ç Highball
highball.summary: Fresh and free-spirited, highball is your drink!
highball.desc:
Like a highball you can enjoy anywhere,
you have bright and cheerful energy.
With friends, alone, or at a picnic,
a highball makes you the mood maker!
highball.tip: Refresh your day with a sparkling highball!

common.copied: URL copied! Share it with your friends.
